titleInfo.title: Martha White Show - Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass - 1977-05-03 - WSM

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Multiple recordings of Martha White Shows, featuring Grant Turner (host), Lester Flatt (host/performer), Kenny Ingram (performer), Benny Martin (performer), Marty Stuart (performer), the Nashville Grass (performers), and special guest John Hartford (performer) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.) First recording is from May 2-6, 1977 and second recording is from May 3, 1977.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
